item.title: 对特朗普要求英特尔首席执行官辞职的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武（Lip-Bu Tan）立即辞职，原因是他在这家陷入困境的芯片制造商担任领导职务仅数月后，就对其在中国企业的大量投资感到担忧。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has demanded the immediate resignation of Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan over concerns of his extensive investments in Chinese firms, just months after he assumed leadership of the struggling chipmaker.】

item.title: 特朗普关税打击印度服装制造商，美国买家称将转移生产
item.description: 自从唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周对印度征收关税以来，服装制造商 Pearl Global（其美国客户名单包括 Gap 和 Kohl's）不断接到午夜恐慌电话，并发出最后通牒：要么分担关税损失，要么将生产迁出印度。【原文：Ever since Donald Trump's tariff salvo on India this week, garment maker Pearl Global - whose U.S. client list includes Gap and Kohl's - has been receiving midnight panic calls with an ultimatum: share the tariff hit or move production out of India.】

item.title: 派拉蒙与 Skydance 完成 80 亿美元的合并，此前已就《60 分钟》诉讼达成和解
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）和天舞传媒公司（Skydance Media）宣布，已完成一年多前宣布的价值 84 亿美元的合并，结束了政治审查和股东担忧等漫长的交易过程。【原文：Paramount Global and Skydance Media have completed their $8.4 billion merger that was announced more than a year ago, the companies said, capping a long-drawn deal process marked by political scrutiny and shareholder concerns.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：沃勒成为特朗普团队中美联储主席的热门人选
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周四援引知情人士的话报道，美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）正在成为特朗普总统团队中担任央行主席的热门人选。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller is emerging as a top candidate to serve as the central bank's chair among President Trump's team, Bloomberg News on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国初创企业 Lyten 收购陷入困境的欧洲电池制造商 Northvolt
item.description: 美国电池初创公司Lyten周四表示，已同意收购破产的瑞典电池制造商Northvolt的大部分股份，这可能为这家曾被视为该地区应对亚洲竞争对手的欧洲公司提供了一条退路。【原文：U.S. battery startup Lyten has agreed to buy most of bankrupt Swedish battery maker Northvolt, it said on Thursday, potentially offering a way back for the European company that was once seen as the region's answer to rivals in Asia.】

item.title: Paxos Trust 与纽约达成 4850 万美元的 Binance 相关和解协议
item.description: 纽约州金融服务监管机构周四表示，Paxos Trust 达成了一项 4850 万美元的和解协议，以解决纽约州对其未能对前合作伙伴 Binance 进行充分尽职调查以及反洗钱计划存在系统性失误的指控。【原文：Paxos Trust reached a $48.5 million settlement to resolve New York charges it failed to conduct sufficient due diligence of its former partner Binance, and had systemic failures in its anti-money laundering program, the state's financial services regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 因美国公用事业增长，Sempra 盈利超出预期
item.description: 受美国公用事业业务增长和成本削减的影响，能源基础设施公司 Sempra 周四公布的第二季度利润超出分析师预期。【原文：Energy infrastructure company Sempra beat analysts' estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by growth in its U.S. utility operations and cost cuts.】

item.title: ESPN-NFL 交易面临监管障碍
item.description: 据法律专家和业内人士透露，美国国家橄榄球联盟与沃尔特-迪斯尼公司（Walt Disney）达成的交易将面临美国司法部的严格审查，在该交易中，美国国家橄榄球联盟将获得 ESPN 的股权，以换取主要媒体资产。【原文：The National Football League's deal with Walt Disney in which it will gain an equity stake in ESPN in return for prime media assets is expected to face scrutiny from the U.S. Department of Justice, according to legal experts and industry sources.】

item.title: Targa Resources 天然气产量创历史新高，利润超出预期，并推进股票回购计划
item.description: 管道运营商 Targa Resources 第二季度调整后的核心利润超出预期，原因是通过其系统运输的天然气和天然气液化气量创下历史新高。【原文：Pipeline operator Targa Resources beat second-quarter adjusted core profit estimates, driven by record-high volumes of natural gas and natural gas liquids transported through its system.】

item.title: GFL 旗下的绿色基础设施合伙公司将通过 42.5 亿美元的交易进行资本结构调整
item.description: GFL Environmental 周四表示，其帮助成立的公司 Green Infrastructure Partners 已与 Energy Capital Partners 管理的基金达成资本重组协议，企业价值为 42.5 亿美元。【原文：GFL Environmental said on Thursday that Green Infrastructure Partners, a company it helped establish, has entered into a deal to be recapitalized by funds managed by Energy Capital Partners at an enterprise value of $4.25 billion.】

item.title: 卢特尼克：美国预计每月关税收入将达 500 亿美元
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四表示，随着对来自数十个国家的进口商品征收更高的关税，他预计美国每月的关税收入将达到500亿美元。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Thursday he expects the country is heading towards $50 billion a month in tariff revenues as higher levies on imports from dozens of countries kick in.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普关税生效后，预计不会立即实施更严厉的转运处罚
item.description: 东南亚的三位知情人士表示，预计美国不会立即对原产于一国但从另一国转运的商品实施更严厉的贸易惩罚，这缓解了人们的一大担忧。【原文：Tougher U.S. trade penalties on goods originating in one country being re-shipped from another are not expected to immediately follow new U.S. tariffs, three people in Southeast Asia with knowledge of the matter said, easing a major cause of concern.】

item.title: 亚马逊网络服务将为美国政府机构提供高达 10 亿美元的折扣优惠
item.description: 美国总务管理局（General Services Administration）周四表示，亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）已同意在2028年底前为美国政府机构提供高达10亿美元的折扣，用于云计算的采用、现代化和培训。【原文：Amazon Web Services has agreed to provide U.S. government agencies with up to $1 billion in discounts for cloud adoption, modernization and training through the end of 2028, the U.S. General Services Administration said Thursday.】

item.title: 英国监管机构将从 2026 年 5 月起收紧支付公司规则
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（FCA）周四表示，将从 2026 年 5 月起对电子支付公司实施更严格的规定，以更好地保护客户的资金安全。【原文：Britain's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) said on Thursday it would roll out stricter rules for electronic payment firms from May 2026 to better safeguard customers' money.】

item.title: 高盛集团称，投资者对私人信贷和被动型股票持冷淡态度
item.description: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一项调查，大型投资者今年对被动股票和私人信贷等领域的投资变得更加谨慎，他们对对冲基金这一行业的兴趣比几年前更大。【原文：Big investors are turning more cautious on areas such as passive equities and private credit this year and are more interested in hedge funds as a sector than they have been for several years, according to a Goldman Sachs survey.】

item.title: 庞巴迪将在美国多个地区扩展售后服务中心
item.description: 庞巴迪公司周四表示，将把服务和支持网络扩展到美国多个地区，这家加拿大公务机制造商的目标是满足客户对售后服务日益增长的需求。【原文：Bombardier said on Thursday it would expand its services and support network to multiple regions in the United States, as the Canadian business jet maker aims to meet increasing demand for aftermarket care from its customers.】

item.title: 马丁玛丽埃塔公司第二季度利润因基础设施需求而增长
item.description: 马丁玛丽埃塔材料公司（Martin Marietta Materials）周四公布，受惠于更强劲的定价和基础设施需求，第二季度利润增长了 12%。【原文：Martin Marietta Materials posted a 12% rise in second-quarter profit on Thursday, aided by stronger pricing and infrastructure demand.】

item.title: 美国最近一周申请失业救济人数上升；第二季度生产率提高
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量有所上升，表明劳动力市场基本稳定，尽管创造就业的力度正在减弱，下岗工人需要更长的时间才能找到新工作。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits ticked higher last week, suggesting the labor market was largely stable even though job creation is weakening and it is taking laid-off workers longer to find new jobs.】

item.title: Peloton 将裁员，预计 2026 年收入强劲；股价飙升
item.description: Peloton Interactive 预测 2026 年收入将高于预期，并表示将裁减 6% 的全球员工，以在持续的扭亏为盈努力中提高成本节约率，这使得这家健身自行车制造商的股价盘前上涨了近 23%。【原文：Peloton Interactive forecast 2026 revenue above estimates and said it would cut 6% of its global workforce to boost cost savings under an ongoing turnaround effort, sending the exercise-bike maker's shares up nearly 23% premarket.】

item.title: 由于需求下降，Froot Loops 生产商 WK Kellogg 公布的季度业绩不佳
item.description: WK Kellogg 周四公布的第二季度财报低于预期，受宏观经济不确定性导致包装早餐谷物需求疲软的影响。【原文：WK Kellogg reported second-quarter results below estimates on Thursday, hurt by soft demand for its packaged breakfast cereal amid macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 独家报道瑞波公司将以 2 亿美元收购稳定币平台 Rail
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普签署一项法律数周后，瑞波公司周四表示，将以 2 亿美元的价格收购稳定币支付平台 Rail。【原文：Ripple will buy stablecoin payments platform Rail for $200 million, the company said on Thursday, weeks after U.S. President Donald Trump signed a law that raised expectations cryptocurrency tokens are about to enter the mainstream.】

item.title: 医疗器械需求强劲，Zimmer Biomet 上调年度利润预期
item.description: 受髋关节和膝关节植入物需求加速的推动，Zimmer Biomet Holdings 周四上调了全年调整后利润预期，第二季度盈利超出预期。【原文：Zimmer Biomet Holdings raised its full-year adjusted profit forecast and beat second-quarter earnings expectations on Thursday, bolstered by accelerating demand for its hip and knee implants.】

item.title: 拉尔夫-劳伦因富裕购物者的需求而上调年度收入预期
item.description: 拉尔夫-劳伦（Ralph Lauren）周四上调了年度营收预期，表明北美、欧洲和亚洲富裕购物者对其 Polo 衬衫和电缆针织毛衣的需求强劲。【原文：Ralph Lauren raised its annual revenue forecast on Thursday, signaling robust demand from affluent shoppers for its Polo shirts and cable-knit sweaters in North America, Europe and Asia.】

item.title: 人工智能引领增长，预期上调提振投资者信心，Duolingo 大涨
item.description: Duolingo 周四收盘前股价大涨近 30%，原因是该公司上调了年度预期，增强了投资者对其通过人工智能功能和社交参与推动用户增长、同时提高货币化能力的信心。【原文：Duolingo shares surged nearly 30% before the bell on Thursday, after its annual forecast increase buoyed investor confidence in its ability to drive user growth through AI features and social engagement, while enhancing monetization.】

item.title: 德国电信与英伟达、布鲁克菲尔德合作建立人工智能数据中心 - 首席执行官
item.description: 德国电信（Deutsche Telekom）首席执行官周四表示，该公司正与英伟达（Nvidia）和加拿大私募股权基金布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）合作，争取在德国北莱茵-威斯特法伦州（North Rhine-Westphalia）建立欧盟人工智能 "千兆工厂 "之一。【原文：Deutsche Telekom is partnering with Nvidia and Canadian private equity fund Brookfield in a bid to build one of the EU's AI "gigafactories" in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, its chief executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普要求英特尔首席执行官辞职
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四要求英特尔新任首席执行官陈立武立即辞职，称他与中国公司的关系受到质疑后 "高度矛盾"。【原文：President Donald Trump on Thursday called for the Intel new CEO Lip-Bu Tan to immediately resign, saying he is "highly conflicted" after questions arose about his ties to Chinese firms.】

item.title: 礼来减肥药数据令人失望，诺和诺德股价大涨
item.description: 在礼来公司实验性减肥药的试验数据低于预期后，诺和诺德公司的股票周四上涨了13.6%，增强了投资者对这家丹麦制药商市场领先的肥胖症治疗药物的信心。【原文：Shares in Novo Nordisk rose 13.6% on Thursday after trial data from Eli Lilly's experimental weight-loss pill fell short of expectations, boosting investor confidence in the Danish drugmaker's market-leading obesity treatment.】

item.title: Datadog 预测云安全应用增加，第三季度业绩乐观
item.description: 云安全公司Datadog周四预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这表明随着企业加大人工智能投资，对其服务的需求不断增长。【原文：Cloud security firm Datadog forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling growing demand for its services as enterprises ramp up investment in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 软件供应商 EPAM 因人工智能驱动的需求而上调年度预测
item.description: 由于企业继续大力投资人工智能技术，对其软件服务的需求强劲，EPAM Systems 周四上调了年度收入和利润预期。【原文：EPAM Systems raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, encouraged by strong demand for its software services as enterprises continue to invest heavily in artificial intelligence technologies.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）周四公布的第二季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，因为产量的增加帮助这家石油和天然气生产商抵消了原油价格疲软带来的冲击。【原文：ConocoPhillips beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, as a rise in output helped the oil and gas producer offset a hit from weak crude prices.】
